sentences.english: Fu Da Kang Industrial Co. , Ltd. is the advanced Taiwan-funded enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 福达康实业有限公司是国内先进的台资企业。

sentences.english: Jin Lai Metal Manufacturing Company established in 1998, is a mid-size Taiwanese enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 金徕五金厂创建于1998年，是一家中型台资企业。

sentences.english: The Company is a Taiwan-funded trading companies.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家台资的贸易公司。

sentences.english: The Taiwan-invested enterprises on the mainland will continue to enjoy national treatment and I don’t think they will be marginalized in the process.
sentences.chinese: 我们将对台资企业继续实行国民待遇。

sentences.english: This thesis derives from data retrieval in an earlier design stage finished by a cell-phone department of a Taiwan-owned enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 本论文为昆山某台资企业的手机设计部门所作。

sentences.english: Founded in 2001, is a Taiwan-funded enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 公司成立于2001年，属台资企业。

sentences.english: The Taiwan-invested businesses on the mainland will continue to enjoy national treatment.
sentences.chinese: 我们将对台资企业继续实行国民待遇。

sentences.english: The company is a Taiwan-funded enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家台资的贸易公司。

definition: abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]
